recipe_name: Soused sardines with tomato and avocado salad
author: Tony Tobin
method: For the soused sardines, place the vinegar, wine, cloves and bay leaf into a pan and bring to the boil. Add the sardine fillets and simmer for 2-3 minutes, or until cooked through. For the tomato and avocado salad, place all of the salad ingredients into a bowl and mix well. To serve, place the tomato and avocado salad onto a plate, top with the soused sardines and pour over the cooking juices. Garnish with dill.
ingredients: 4 tbsp white wine vinegar,  75ml/2½fl oz white wine,  2 cloves,  1 bay leaf,  2 sardine fillets,  200g/7oz yellow and red tomatoes, sliced,  pinch sea salt,  1 tbsp balsamic vinegar,  dash olive oil,  freshly ground black pepper,  ¼ avocado, stone removed, peeled and sliced,  sprig fresh dill, to garnish
